short_desc: Family advocacy, resource access, and individualized support for immigrants and refugees
description: Helps immigrant and refugee clients access vital community resources. Provides family advocacy for newly arrived refugees, single mothers, and others in need of individualized support.Also provides services in San Francisco and the South Bay. San Francisco office is located at 870 Market Street, Suite 718, San Francisco. South Bay office is located at 1922 The Alameda, Suite 425 San Jose. All programs can be contacted at 415-989-2151.
